summary: This is an email from a U.S. Attorney's Office contractor, Sunny Drescher, summarizing a call on November 11, 2021. The call discussed logistics for a meeting and mentioned that during document authentication, a file authored by Ghislaine Maxwell containing descriptions of women was discovered. The AUSA stated they did not plan to ask about that document.

persons.name: Sunny Drescher
persons.context: Author of the email summarizing a call about logistics and a discovered document.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as the author of a file containing descriptions of women, discovered during document authentication.

events.title: Call Regarding Meeting Logistics and Document Discovery
events.description: A call took place to discuss logistics for an upcoming meeting. During the call, it was mentioned that a file authored by Ghislaine Maxwell with descriptions of women was discovered while confirming the authenticity of extracted documents.

keyFacts: A file authored by Ghislaine Maxwell containing descriptions of women was discovered during the authentication of extracted documents.
The discovery was mentioned in a call on November 11, 2021, which primarily concerned logistics for a meeting.
An Assistant United States Attorney stated they did not plan to ask about the Maxwell-authored document during the upcoming proceedings.
